pendingchanges-legend:
{{Flagged Revs-small}}
Used on Special:OldReviewedPages as title/legend of the fieldset.
pendingchanges-list:
{{Flagged Revs}}
Used on Special:OldReviewedPages.

Refers to {{msg-mw|Validationpage}}.

Parameters:
* $1 - (Optional) the number of pages going to be listed, to be used with PLURAL
pendingchanges-size:
{{Flagged Revs}}

Used on Special:OldReviewedPages as a label for an input field in the form.
pendingchanges-viewing:
{{Flagged Revs-small}}
Used on Special:OldReviewedPages when someone has recently requested the sighting page for a listed page.
pendingchanges-table-caption:
{{Flagged Revs}}
Caption for the table displaying pending changes.
pendingchanges-table-page:
{{Flagged Revs}}
Header for the column displaying the page title in the table of pending changes.
pendingchanges-table-size:
{{Flagged Revs}}
Header for the column displaying the size in the table of pending changes.
pendingchanges-table-pending-since:
{{Flagged Revs}}
Header for the column displaying how long the changes have been pending in the table of pending changes.
pendingchanges-table-quality:
{{Flagged Revs}}
Header for the column displaying the quality of the page in the table of pending changes.
pendingchanges-table-watching:
{{Flagged Revs}}
Header for the column displaying the number of users watching the page in the table of pending changes.
pendingchanges-table-history:
{{Flagged Revs}}
Header for the column displaying the history of the page in the table of pending changes.
pendingchanges-table-review:
{{Flagged Revs}}
Header for the column displaying the review link in the table of pending changes.
pendingchanges-table-revision-history:
{{Flagged Revs}}
Header for the column displaying the revision history link in the table of pending changes.
pendingchanges-table-footer:
{{Flagged Revs}}
Displayed at the bottom of the table in Special:PendingChanges to show the number of pending changes.

Parameters:
* $1 - number of pending changes, used with PLURAL to determine singular or plural form.
pendingchanges-filter-submit-button-text: Label for the submit button in the filter form on Special:OldReviewedPages, allowing users to apply the selected filters.
